DOC.brief_summary: A study to compare insulin use and its effect on glucose control and other outcomes in patients with Type 2 diabetes who together with their healthcare provider manage their disease by discussing and agreeing on the diabetes treatment chosen from a selection of available treatment options.
DOC.brief_title: A Concordance Study Comparing Insulin Treatments in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes Insulinnaive Nonsmoker Significant pulmonary, hepatic or renal disease severe congestive heart failure active malignancy or malignancy within the last 5 years systemic glucocorticoid therapy
